KITTY !!!
#furry #anime

Moderator note: Please tag correctly
#alexandrinasebastiane #alexandrina_sebastiane #zenless_zone_zero #zzz #Anime #sights

first sight i ever made, thought i might make something practical for low-tier players with less experience
you aim under the enemy and somewhat to the left (image attached) and the center line of the scope lines up with their tracks.

where the top of the tank is tells you how far away it is, but obviously this will vary from tank to tank (it won't really work against the Object 775, for example)

don't use this as a rangefinder; use it to help you to get better at rangefinding (although you can do whatever you want, of course).

the sight only works for tanks with a 1.9x zoom at min...

#sight #anime #animesight #daebom #sturmtiger
